titlestmt.titleproper: RG 074:008, Harry I. Thompson West Haven Genealogical Papers
titlestmt.subtitle: Inventory
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Damon M. Munz.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Damon M. Munz on July 11, 2008

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Harry I. Thompson West Haven genealogical papers
did.abstract: Notebooks and manuscript notes related to West Haven, Connecticut genealogy.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Notebooks and manuscript notes related to West Haven, Connecticut genealogy.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Letters and list of portraits by Harry Ives Thompson [CSL call number StLib Archives 920 T373].

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: These records are stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.

altformavail.head: Alternative Form Available
altformavail.p: The 42 notebooks are available on microfilm [CSL call number L.H. 4432-4434/5 (3 reels).]

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: These papers were received on January 4, 1939 from Mr. Frederick W. Slater of New Haven, agent for Clarence E. Thompson, Jr. Clarence E. Thompson, Jr. inherited the papers from Harry I. Thompson.
The notebooks and manuscript notes were at one time separated. The manuscript notes were formerly catalogued as 974.62 W524t.

did.unittitle: Notebooks

note.p: Pages are numbered consecutively for Volumes 1-19. Pages are unnumbered starting with Volume 20.

did.unittitle: Painter and allied families
Beecher, Smith, Candee, Thompson families, and others

scopecontent.p: Contains copies of deeds, wills, etc.

Independent, etc."
